column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I order 3 COROMANDEL (FOOD POISONING)  raw oysters
column2: roasted bone marrow and my husband gets the beet salad for apps. We order the the 24oz Bone in Dry Aged Ribeye and potato to split
column3: plus drinks. I quickly change my potato to go for the wedge salad (I am a connoisseur of them). I get my 3 oysters and not only does one taste really funky
column4: but all 3 taste like they are sitting in a saline solution bath. They literally tasted like someone soaked them in a  bucket of salt and I am a seasoned oyster eater (Shaw's loves me).
